TestCase.name: testInWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: HashJoin(joinType=[LeftSemiJoin], where=[=(c, a1)], select=[a, b, c], build=[right], tryDistinctBuildRow=[true]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]], shuffle_mode=[BATCH]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], reuse_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1]) +- Calc(select=[a AS a1], where=[=(b, _UTF-16LE'two')]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testInWithProject
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b2=[AS(IN($1, 1972-02-22 07:12:00.333:TIMESTAMP(3)), _UTF-16LE'b2')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[IN(b, 1972-02-22 07:12:00.333:TIMESTAMP(3)) AS b2]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
